am_hal_pdm.c File Reference

HAL implementation for the PDM module. More...

Detailed Description

HAL implementation for the PDM module.

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
#include "mcu/am_hal_crm_private.h"
